entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
